org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood

Class MaxPiecewisePseudoLikelihood

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
      • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.VotedPerceptron
        • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood.MaxPiecewisePseudoLikelihood
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class MaxPiecewisePseudoLikelihood
extends VotedPerceptron
    Learns weights by optimizing the piecewise-pseudo-log-likelihood of the data using the voted perceptron algorithm.

      • computeExpectedIncompatibility

        protected void computeExpectedIncompatibility()
        Compute the expected incompatibility using the piecewisepseudolikelihood. Use Monte Carlo integration to approximate epectations.
        Overrides:
        computeExpectedIncompatibility in class VotedPerceptron

      • computeLoss

        public double computeLoss()
        Description copied from class: VotedPerceptron
        Internal method for computing the loss at the current point before taking a step. Child methods may override. The default implementation just sums the product of the difference between the expected and observed incompatibility.
        Overrides:
        computeLoss in class VotedPerceptron
        Returns:
        current learning loss

      • computeObservedIncompatibility

        protected void computeObservedIncompatibility()
        Description copied from class: VotedPerceptron
        Compute the incompatibility in the model using the labels (truth values) from the observed (truth) database. This method is responsible for filling the observedIncompatibility member variable. This may call setLabeledRandomVariables() and not reset any ground atoms to their original value. The default implementation just calls setLabeledRandomVariables() and sums the incompatibility for each rule.
        Overrides:
        computeObservedIncompatibility in class VotedPerceptron

      • setBudget

        public void setBudget(double budget)
        Description copied from class: WeightLearningApplication
        Set a budget (give as a proportion of the max budget). Child implementations should make sure to override this and call up the super chain.
        Overrides:
        setBudget in class VotedPerceptron
